page.title: 18SOCIETIES/CLUBS IN EARDISLEY
page.content: Once a year on August Bank Holiday the {Eardisley & District Flower Show and {Sports Committee}hold a show and carnival.The committee hold events throughout the year to raise funds to put on the show.It is a day full of fun and high spirits. {Eardisley over sixties club}is well attended.It has a membership of 50. They meet once a fortnight.They go on outings and have draws and whist drives as well as just meeting socially. {Eardisley W.I.}has a membership of 36.It meets once a month.Their special interest is craft competitions.They have just completed a graveyard survey which will go to the County Archives after it has been on display at this years village festival.
